subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{zh-l|么}} is used instead of {{lang|zh|幺}} in mahjong and as a surname. ''{{w|Xiandai Hanyu Guifan Cidian}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|现代汉语规范词典|suf=》}}) says '{{lang|zh|幺}}' and '{{lang|zh|么}}' are different characters.
